project_descr: This Readiness programme is to support additional NDA capacity strengthening and private sector mobilization for the development of climate change adaptation and mitigation programmes aligned with national policies and needs.

outputs.output_descr:
Readiness activities are being implemented to support the NDA/FP of Haiti in its efforts to lead effective coordination mechanisms, engage with stakeholders in consultative processes; and identify candidate entities for accreditation. In addition to this ongoing effort, the Haitian Government is engaging in dialogue with private sector to increase interest in finding new economic and sustainable opportunities.  The importance of engaging private sector in this initiative has been highlighted among national stakeholders and in the GCF structured dialogue in June 2017 in Belize. 

The Focal Poin
